release.action: using new biobabel-core to cope with new reactome ids - see UES-16

release.description: Updates for new Rhea data model
release.action: Updated to latest versions of intenz-core, intenz-mapper, intenz-ffwriter and all rhea artifacts (new data model).
Extended limit of text field for enzyme names.
Updated to latest version of parent, intenz-ffwriter, rhea-mapper, rhea-util, rhea-biopax, rhea-find-struts1 and biobabel-core.
Inactive preliminary EC numbers can be created now.
UniProt cross references shown also when there are no others.
Cofactors view is now properly shown.
Now the reason of a suggestion or proposal is shown in the entry view and also in the listing of suggested/proposed changes.
Book editions can have values other than integers (ex. '2nd').
XChars markup can now be properly stored and edited for links.
Cofactors are now properly sorted in SIB preview.

Variable osuser is now set in the database session (auditpackage) when the connection is established, by calling explicitly the method setosuser, which allows removing the reference to V$SESSION from the body of the package (Rhea does not use it, but this explicit call instead).
Updated dependency on intenz-ffwriter.

release.description: Health check for the curator tool.
release.action: Added filter and JSP to allow health checks from the load balancer without logging them.

release.description: Fixed citations URLs; using WS for ChEBI public data.
release.action: Fixed URL for bibliographic references (used to be SRS, now is Europe PubMed Central).

Updated to latest version of parent, intenz-core, intenz-mapper, intenz-ffwriter, rhea-webapp-util - which uses ChEBI web services for ChEBI public data instead of a connection to the database -, rhea-chebiUpdater, biobabel-webapp, biobabel-core, biobabel-citations and log4j.
Removed unused database connection to ChEBI public.

Updated to latest version of intenz-core and intenz-mapper - which implement IUBMB flags for enzyme-reaction associations -, intenz-ffwriter, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper, biobabel-core and biobabel-citations.
Added controls to manage IUBMB flags for reactions.

release.description: Editing target EC of transferred entries
release.action: Now it is possible to edit the target EC in already transferred entries.

release.description: Editing notes for already deleted/transferred enzymes
release.action: Updated to latest versions of intenz-core, intenz-mapper, intenz-ffwriter, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper, rhea-util, rhea-ph, rhea-biopax, rhea-find-struts1, rhea-taglib, rhea-chebiUpdater, biobabel-core, biobabel-db, biobabel-citations (which now uses CiteXplore WS v3) and commons-collections.
Now it is possible to edit history notes for deleted and transferred entries.
Fixed NPE when trying to import a new cofactor from ChEBI.
Caught errors from citations retrieval: now there is an error message in the form but no blank page.
Reaction source is now handled using a Rhea class, not an EnzymeSourceConstant.
Updated to latest version of intenz-ffwriter and forced to latest biobabel-citations, which fixes issue with jaxws versions.
Proper use of the rhea-webapp-util module (missing objects in session/application scope).
Removed duplicate jar files from included war artifacts, which caused classpath conflicts (two versions of the same jar file).
Updated to latest version of most intenz and rhea modules, one of them (rhea-domain) required to deal with reactions cross-referencing EcoCyc.
Updated database configuration to point to the new 11g instance.
Updated to latest version of intenz-core, intenz-mapper, intenz-ffwriter, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper, rhea-chebiIdAssigner, rhea-find-struts1, rhea-search-struts1, rhea-chebiUpdater and biobabel-db.
Updated to latest version of several dependencies, one of them - biobabel-core - fixes a bug in the CAS number validation.
Updated to latest version of intenz-ffwriter with DE line modifications.
Updated to latest version of intenz-core and displaytag.
Fixed overlay of war dependencies to avoid clashing versions of dependencies (esp. log4j).
Removed static links (based on EC number) - which are automatically generated - from the database and the drop-down selector.

release.description: Preliminary EC numbers and maintainable authentication
release.action: Added support for preliminary EC numbers: create, amend, transfer, search, list, link to other preliminary ECs.
Updated dependencies.

Refactored authentication: Users identify themselves at login using the method configured in the application container (web.xml or context file), so that their passwords are stored in just one place, not three. All of the users share the database user, but their work is distinguished in the audit tables by their v$session.osuser oracle property (now set when opening the connection).
Textual reactions are now stripped of any line feed characters to avoid problems in the exported enzyme.dat.
Removed dependency on citations-1.0 which clashed with transitive dependency on citations-1.0.3.
Updated dependency to biobabel.db to fix an issue related to tnsnames.ora file not found.
Fixed bug related to wrong name given to a session attribute.
Added list of cofactors in IntEnz to allow their re-mapping.
Updated to latest version of xchars-config.
Excluded xchars jar files from war dependencies, as they accumulated different versions in the WEB-INF/lib directory.
Fixed bug introduced in previous release, related to reaction status.
Fixed problem with addition of complex cofactors (ANDed/ORed) when the compound name included '+' or parentheses.
Updated to latest intenz.mapper to use rhea mapper interfaces.
Updated to latest rhea.search module to use Rhea colour code for reaction status.
Added functionality to add ORed cofactors.
Updated to latest rhea modules and intenz.mapper to fix a bug due to new xrefs and update management in rheactions.
Added check to avoid losing cofactors when committing an entry.
Updated to latest mapper version.
Added menu item for curator manual.
Updated to latest biobabel util package which fixes a bug in the way OperatorSets are parsed from Strings. This made cofactors to disappear in some cases.
Fixed display and linking of ORed/ANDed cofactors.
Complex reactions are shown properly, that is with their child reactions.
Moved unused helper classes to the db-indexing module.
Fixed cofactor handling and displaying.
